channel.title: Earning Update on granthutchison
channel.description: Recent content in Earning Update on granthutchison

item.title: The Millionaire Life
item.description: Users and Earnings # So, back in September I both implemented ads on the site and released my first proper app (although I didn’t put Ads into WristCheck until v1.2 about a month later). This was all a fun experiment to see if I could make this wee hobby break even… want to hear how it’s going? A summary of costs # Let’s start off with what it costs to put things together.
